00092             function                get_list_of_tables( $DumpCreationConfig )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         $ListOfTables = $DumpCreationConfig->get_setting( 'tables' );
00097                         
00098                         if( $ListOfTables === 'all' )
00099                         {
00100                               return( $this->Database->get_list_of_tables() );
00101                         }
00102                         else
00103                         {
00104                               return( explode( ',' , $ListOfTables ) );
00105                         }
00106                   }
00107                   catch( Exception $e )
00108                   {
00109                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00110                   }
00111             }

00139             function                get_drop_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00140             {
00141                   try
00142                   {
00143                         if( $TableDumpCreationConfig->get_setting( 'delete_existing' , false ) )
00144                         {
00145                               $TableName = $this->Security->get( $TableName , 'command' );
00146                               
00147                               /* removing prefix */
00148                               $ClearTableName = str_replace( 
00149                                     array( $this->Database->TablenamePrefix , 'umx_' ) , array( '' , '' ) , $TableName
00150                               );
00151                               
00152                               return( "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `[lfb]prefix[rfb]$ClearTableName`;\n" );
00153                         }
00154                         else
00155                         {
00156                               return( '' );
00157                         }
00158                   }
00159                   catch( Exception $e )
00160                   {
00161                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00162                   }
00163             }

00191             function                get_fields_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00192             {
00193                   try
00194                   {
00195                         $TableName = $this->Security->get( $TableName , 'command' );
00196                         
00197                         $Fields = $this->Database->get_list_of_fields( $TableName );
00198                         
00199                         foreach( $Fields as $i => $FieldInfo )
00200                         {
00201                               $FieldName = '`'.get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Field' ).'` ';
00202                               $FieldType = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Type' ).' ';
00203                               $Null = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Null' ) == 'NO' ? 'NOT NULL ' : '';
00204                               $Default = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Default' );
00205                               $Default = strlen( $Default ) ? "default '$Default' " : '';
00206                               $Extra = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Extra' );
00207                               if( $Extra == 'auto_increment' )
00208                               {
00209                                     $Fields[] = "     PRIMARY KEY  ( $FieldName)";
00210                               }
00211                               $Extra = strlen( $Extra ) ? "$Extra " : '';
00212                               $Fields[ $i ] = " $FieldName$FieldType$Null$Default$Extra";
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         return( implode( ",\n" , $Fields ) );
00216                   }
00217                   catch( Exception $e )
00218                   {
00219                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00220                   }
00221             }
00222             
00249             function                get_auto_increment( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00250             {
00251                   try
00252                   {
00253                         $TableName = $this->Security->get( $TableName , 'command' );
00254                         
00255                         $Fields = $this->Database->get_list_of_fields( $TableName );
00256                         
00257                         foreach( $Fields as $i => $FieldInfo )
00258                         {
00259                               $Extra = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Extra' );
00260                               
00261                               if( $Extra == 'auto_increment' )
00262                               {
00263                                     $FieldName = get_field( $FieldInfo , 'Field' );
00264                                     $MaxValue = $this->Database->select( "MAX( $FieldName ) AS max_field_value" , "`$TableName`" );
00265                                     $MaxValue = intval( get_field( $MaxValue[ 0 ] , 'max_field_value' ) ) + 1;
00266                                     
00267                                     return( "AUTO_INCREMENT=$MaxValue" );
00268                               }
00269                         }
00270                         
00271                         return( '' );
00272                   }
00273                   catch( Exception $e )
00274                   {
00275                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00276                   }
00277             }

00305             function                get_create_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00306             {
00307                   try
00308                   {
00309                         $TableName = $this->Security->get( $TableName , 'command' );
00310                         
00311                         /* removing prefix */
00312                         $ClearTableName = str_replace( 
00313                               array( $this->Database->TablenamePrefix , 'umx_' ) , array( '' , '' ) , $TableName
00314                         );
00315                         $Dump  = "CREATE TABLE `[lfb]prefix[rfb]$ClearTableName` (\n";
00316                         
00317                         $Dump .= $this->get_fields_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName );
00318                         
00319                         $Encoding = $TableDumpCreationConfig->get_setting( 'encoding' , 'utf8' );
00320                         $Autoincrement = $this->get_auto_increment( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName );
00321                         $Dump .= "\n) $Autoincrement DEFAULT CHARSET=$Encoding;\n\n";
00322 
00323                         return( $Dump );
00324                   }
00325                   catch( Exception $e )
00326                   {
00327                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00328                   }
00329             }

00357             function                get_structure_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00358             {
00359                   try
00360                   {
00361                         if( $TableDumpCreationConfig->get_setting( 'delete_existing' , false ) )
00362                         {
00363                               $Dump  = $this->get_drop_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName );
00364                               
00365                               $Dump .= $this->get_create_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName );
00366                               
00367                               return( $Dump );
00368                         }
00369                         else
00370                         {
00371                               return( '' );
00372                         }
00373                   }

00375                   {
00376                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00410             function                get_insert_dump( $TableName , &$Fields , &$Records )
00411             {
00412                   try
00413                   {
00414                         $Dump = '';
00415                         
00416                         if( isset( $Records[ 0 ] ) )
00417                         {
00418                               /* removing prefix */
00419                               $ClearTableName = str_replace( 
00420                                     array( $this->Database->TablenamePrefix , 'umx_' ) , array( '' , '' ) , $TableName
00421                               );
00422                               $Dump = "INSERT INTO `[lfb]prefix[rfb]$ClearTableName` ( $Fields ) VALUES \n";
00423                               foreach( $Records as $i => $Record )
00424                               {
00425                                     $Record = str_replace( array( "\r" , "\n" , "'" ) , array( '\r' , '\n' , '&#039;' ) , $Record );
00426                                     $Records[ $i ] = "( '".implode( "' , '" , $Record )."' )";
00427                               }
00428                               $Dump .= implode( ",\n" , $Records ).";\n\n";
00429                         }
00430                         
00431                         return( $Dump );
00432                   }
00433                   catch( Exception $e )
00434                   {
00435                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00436                   }
00437             }

00465             function                get_data_dump( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName )
00466             {
00467                   try
00468                   {
00469                         $Dump = '';
00470                         
00471                         if( $TableDumpCreationConfig->get_setting( 'records' , false ) )
00472                         {
00473                               $Fields = get_field_ex( $this->Database->get_list_of_fields( $TableName ) , 'Field' );
00474                               $Fields = '`'.implode( '` , `' , $Fields ).'`';
00475                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_ARRAY );
00476                               $Records = $this->Database->select( '*' , "`$TableName`" );
00477                               
00478                               $Dump = $this->get_insert_dump( $TableName , $Fields , $Records );
00479                         }
00480                         
00481                         return( $Dump );
00482                   }
00483                   catch( Exception $e )
00484                   {
00485                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00486                   }
00487             }

00553             function                get_dump( $DumpName )
00554             {
00555                   try
00556                   {
00557                         $DumpCreationConfig = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00558                         $DumpName = $this->Security->get( $DumpName , 'command' );
00559                         $DumpCreationConfig->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ )."/conf/$DumpName" , '#' );
00560                         
00561                         $Dump = '';                   
00562                         $Tables = $this->get_list_of_tables( $DumpCreationConfig );
00563                         foreach( $Tables as $i => $TableName )
00564                         {
00565                               $DefaultConfig = 'records;structure;enecoding=utf8;delete_existing';
00566                               $TableDumpCreationConfig = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00567                               $TableDumpCreationConfig->load_settings( 
00568                                     $DumpCreationConfig->get_setting( $TableName , $DefaultConfig )
00569                               );
00570                               
00571                               $Dump .= $this->get_dump_of_table( $TableDumpCreationConfig , $TableName );
00572                         }
00573                         
00574                         return( rtrim( $Dump , "\n" ) );
00575                   }
00576                   catch( Exception $e )
00577                   {
00578                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00579                   }
00580             }

00604             function                view( $Options )
00605             {
00606                   try
00607                   {
00608                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'dump_settings_form' , 0 ) == 1 )
00609                         {
00610                         }
00611                         elseif( $Options->get_setting( 'dump' , 0 ) == 1 )
00612                         {
00613                               $Dump = $this->get_dump( 'full_dump' );
00614                               
00615                               header( 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' );
00616                               header( 'Content-type: application/octet-stream' );
00617                               header( "Content-Length: ".strlen( $Dump ) );
00618                               header( "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"data.sql\"" );
00619                               header( 'Connection: close' );
00620       
00621                               return( $Dump );
00622                         }
00623                         else
00624                         {
00625                               return( '' );
00626                         }
00627                   }
00628                   catch( Exception $e )
00629                   {
00630                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00631                   }
00632             }
